mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @orderno:=CASE WHEN @noid=t1.noid THEN @orderno+1 ELSE 1 END AS orderno,t1.lgmid,t1.sid,t1.rmid,@noid := t1.noid AS noid,t1.playoridle,t1.lotteryterm,t1.opentime,t1.orderamount FROM ( SELECT a.lgmid,a.sid,a.rmid,a.noid,a.playoridle,a.lotteryterm,a.opentime,a.orderamount FROM lottery_Game_order a RIGHT JOIN (SELECT c.sid,c.rmid,c.noid,c.playoridle,c.lotteryterm,c.counts FROM (SELECT sid,rmid,noid,playoridle,lotteryterm,COUNT(*) AS counts FROM lottery_game_order WHERE sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and lotteryterm = #{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND rmid not like '9%' AND lastamount >=0 GROUP BY rmid,noid,playoridle) c WHERE c.counts>=3) d ON a.sid=d.sid AND a.rmid=d.rmid AND a.noid=d.noid WHERE a.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm = #{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.rmid,a.noid,a.playoridle,a.orderamount DESC) t1,(SELECT @orderno:=1,@noid:='') AS t2) t3 WHERE t3.orderno =2 OR t3.orderno=3

SELECT c.rmid,c.noid,c.playoridle FROM lottery_game_order a RIGHT JOIN (SELECT b.rmid,b.sid,b.playoridle,b.noid,SUM(b.counts) AS counts FROM ( SELECT rmid,sid,playoridle,noid,COUNT(rmid) AS counts FROM lottery_game_order WHERE sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and lotteryterm = #{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rmid not like '9%' and result is null GROUP BY rmid,playoridle order by playoridle asc) b GROUP BY b.rmid) c ON c.sid = a.sid AND c.rmid = a.rmid AND c.noid=a.noid WHERE a.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.lotteryterm = #{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.rmid not like '9%' and a.result is null and c.counts>4 GROUP BY a.noid,a.rmid

mapper.select: SELECT (@i:=@i+1) AS orderno,c.accountid as accountid,c.ausername as ausername,c.lastamount as lastamount,c.playoridle as playoridle FROM (SELECT t1.accountid,t3.ausername,SUM(t1.lastamount) AS lastamount,t1.playoridle FROM lottery_game_order t1,account_info t3 WHERE t1.accountid = t3.accountid AND rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND lotteryterm = #{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY accountid ORDER BY t1.lastamount DESC) c,(SELECT @i:=0) t2

SELECT c.lgmid, @orderno:=CASE WHEN @noid=c.noid THEN @orderno+1 ELSE 1 END AS orderno, d.ausername, @noid := c.noid AS noid, c.orderamount,c.ratio,c.playoridle,c.result,c.lastamount FROM ( SELECT a.lgmid,a.noid,a.accountid,a.orderamount,a.orderamount/m.ratio AS ratio,a.playoridle,a.result,a.lastamount FROM lottery_game_order a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.noid,SUM(a.orderamount) AS ratio FROM lottery_game_order a WHERE a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.rmid=#{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.noid) AS m ON a.noid = m.noid WHERE a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.rmid=#{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND m.noid=a.noid ORDER BY noid,lgmid ) AS c left join account_info d on c.accountid = d.accountid, (SELECT @orderno:=1,@noid:='') AS b ORDER BY c.noid,c.lgmid ASC,c.orderamount ASC

select a.LGMID,b.gamename,b.gamelobbyname,a.lotteryterm,c.roomid, a.noid,getCodeName('IsOridle',a.playoridle) AS playoridle, a.orderamount,a.result,a.lastamount FROM ((lottery_game_order a LEFT JOIN lottery_game b ON a.sid = b.sid) LEFT JOIN lottery_room c ON a.rmid = c.rmid ) WHERE a.RESULT IS NOT NULL AND a.lotteryterm = getLotteryTerm(#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND a.accountid =#{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT c.lgmid, @orderno:=CASE WHEN @noid=c.noid THEN @orderno+1 ELSE 1 END AS orderno, d.ausername, @noid := c.noid AS noid, c.orderamount,c.ratio,c.playoridle FROM ( SELECT a.lgmid,a.noid,a.accountid,a.orderamount,a.orderamount/m.ratio AS ratio,a.playoridle FROM lottery_game_order a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.noid,SUM(a.orderamount) AS ratio FROM lottery_game_order a WHERE a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid=#{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.noid) AS m ON a.noid = m.noid WHERE a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid=#{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND m.noid=a.noid ORDER BY noid,lgmid ) AS c left join account_info d on c.accountid = d.accountid, (SELECT @orderno:=1,@noid:='') AS b ORDER BY c.noid,c.lgmid ASC,c.orderamount ASC

mapper.select: SELECT a.lgmid,a.accountid,b.usermoney, a.PLAYORIDLE,a.orderamount,a.lastamount,c.resultvalue,c.ascc,c.ratio,d.gametype AS TYPE,a.noid FROM lottery_game_order a LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.accountid, a.noid,a.lgmid,SUM(a.orderamount) AS asum FROM lottery_game_order a WHERE a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.accountid,a.noid) a1 ON (a.accountid = a1.accountid and a.noid=a1.noid) LEFT JOIN account_info b ON a.accountid = b.accountid LEFT JOIN lottery_game_results c ON a.lotteryterm = c.lotteryterm AND a.sid=c.sid AND a.noid=c.noid LEFT JOIN lottery_game d ON a.sid = d.sid WHERE a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY c.ascc,a.noid desc,a1.asum desc,a.orderamount desc,a.ordertime desc,a1.lgmid desc for update

SELECT a.lgmid,a.accountid,b.usermoney, a.PLAYORIDLE,a.orderamount,a.lastamount,c.resultvalue,c.ascc,c.ratio,d.gametype AS TYPE,a.noid FROM lottery_game_order a LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.accountid, a.noid,a.lgmid,SUM(a.orderamount) AS asum FROM lottery_game_order a WHERE a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.accountid,a.noid) a1 ON (a.accountid = a1.accountid and a.noid=a1.noid) LEFT JOIN account_info b ON a.accountid = b.accountid LEFT JOIN lottery_game_results c ON a.lotteryterm = c.lotteryterm AND a.sid=c.sid AND a.noid=c.noid LEFT JOIN lottery_game d ON a.sid = d.sid WHERE a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY c.ascc,a.noid asc,a1.asum ASC,a.orderamount asc,a.ordertime ASC,a1.lgmid asc for update

SELECT a.lgmid,a.accountid,b.usermoney, a.PLAYORIDLE,a.orderamount,a.lastamount,c.resultvalue,c.ascc,c.ratio,d.gametype AS type,a.noid FROM lottery_game_order a,account_info b,lottery_game_results c,lottery_game d WHERE a.accountid = b.accountid AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.lotteryterm=c.lotteryterm AND a.sid=c.sid AND a.noid=c.noid AND a.sid = d.sid AND a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c.ascc>(SELECT e.ascc FROM lottery_game_order d ,lottery_game_results e WHERE d.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND d.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d.playoridle = '1' AND d.noid = e.noid and d.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d.lotteryterm = e.lotteryterm ORDER BY ascc LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY c.ascc,a.orderamount asc,a.ordertime asc,a.noid ASC for update

SELECT a.lgmid,a.accountid,b.usermoney, a.PLAYORIDLE,a.orderamount,a.lastamount,c.resultvalue,c.ascc,c.ratio,d.gametype AS type,a.noid FROM lottery_game_order a,account_info b,lottery_game_results c,lottery_game d WHERE a.accountid = b.accountid AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.lotteryterm=c.lotteryterm AND a.sid=c.sid AND a.noid=c.noid AND a.sid = d.sid AND a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND c.ascc<(SELECT e.ascc FROM lottery_game_order d ,lottery_game_results e WHERE d.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND d.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d.playoridle = '1' AND d.noid = e.noid and d.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d.lotteryterm = e.lotteryterm ORDER BY ascc LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY c.ascc,a.orderamount asc,a.ordertime asc ,a.noid ASC for update

SELECT a.lgmid,a.accountid,b.usermoney, a.PLAYORIDLE,a.orderamount,a.lastamount,c.resultvalue,c.ascc,c.ratio,d.gametype AS TYPE,a.noid FROM lottery_game_order a LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.accountid, a.lgmid,SUM(a.orderamount) AS asum FROM lottery_game_order a WHERE a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.accountid) a1 ON (a.accountid = a1.accountid) LEFT JOIN account_info b ON a.accountid = b.accountid LEFT JOIN lottery_game_results c ON a.lotteryterm = c.lotteryterm AND a.sid=c.sid AND a.noid=c.noid LEFT JOIN lottery_game d ON a.sid = d.sid WHERE a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.playoridle = '1' and c.ascc = (SELECT e.ascc FROM lottery_game_order d ,lottery_game_results e WHERE d.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND d.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d.playoridle = '1' AND d.noid = e.noid and d.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.sid=e.sid AND d.lotteryterm = e.lotteryterm ORDER BY ascc LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY a1.asum ASC,a1.lgmid,a.orderamount,a.ordertime ASC for update

SELECT a.lgmid,a.accountid,b.usermoney, a.PLAYORIDLE,a.orderamount,a.lastamount,c.resultvalue,c.ascc,c.ratio,d.gametype AS TYPE,a.noid FROM lottery_game_order a LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.accountid, a.lgmid,SUM(a.orderamount) AS asum FROM lottery_game_order a WHERE a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.noid = #{noid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.accountid) a1 ON (a.accountid = a1.accountid) LEFT JOIN account_info b ON a.accountid = b.accountid LEFT JOIN lottery_game_results c ON a.lotteryterm = c.lotteryterm AND a.sid=c.sid AND a.noid=c.noid LEFT JOIN lottery_game d ON a.sid = d.sid WHERE a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.noid = #{noid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a1.asum ASC,a1.lgmid,a.orderamount,a.ordertime ASC for update

SELECT a.lgmid,a.accountid,b.usermoney, a.PLAYORIDLE,a.orderamount,a.lastamount,c.resultvalue,c.ascc,c.ratio,d.gametype AS type,a.noid FROM lottery_game_order a,account_info b,lottery_game_results c,lottery_game d WHERE a.accountid = b.accountid AND a.lotteryterm=#{lotteryterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.lotteryterm=c.lotteryterm AND a.sid=c.sid AND a.noid=c.noid AND a.sid = d.sid and a.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.rmid = #{rmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.playoridle = '1' ORDER BY c.ascc,a.orderamount,a.ordertime asc,a.noid ASC for update
